Go to the windmill and use the knife on the sac. The copper key will fall out. Use the key on the casket in that church at the graveyard. You will find the crucifix. Posts.EditableText:
Fine. I will spoil now. Use the disc on the indent. 
You should find an iron key, if I remember correctly. Go to the graveyard, use it on the gate. Open the gate, and enter the crypt
Use the shovel on the sarcophagus. It will break, so go fix it with the sap, come back and do the same again. This time, you should find a corpse. Look at it, and there should be a gold key. That opens the tower. Inside you should find the puzzlebox. As previous posts say, 'throw puzzlebox'  when you're at the top. It will break at the bottom, and inside will be the ring.
'pull skeleton' is what you should do. and then take the bone when it comes off. Give the bone to the wolf.

You basically should have the gold crown from the hollow in the 'ex-dead' oak tree. Enter the caves, cross the cloud and GIVE CROWN TO GHOST in the Sepulchre tomb. He will offer the Battlehorn. After the TAKE BATTLEHORN in the walkthu section following the rest of it will finish the game.
